title: Tired of trying to log in
body:
I run the launcher, hit play, enter my info and then  I hit login nothing happen it's still try to log in 
I wait for 30 mint and nothing happen or got error message  
i try run launcher as admin, change dns, turn of firewall and anti virus, reinstall patch,reinstall game on ather disk and same 
this problem happen in EU Nordic & west, I let  that account and travel to EU West  and happen here

replies.body:
Login issues can be caused by a few different factors, but the biggest two are Internet Explorer Security settings or network configurations. I strongly encourage you to work through the common solutions we've consolidated in our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps resolved the issue.
